title: Using the Subset Formula
text: The formula for finding the number of subsets of a set is $$2^n$$.

title: Finding the Total Number of Elements
text: Before applying the subset formula, first find the total number of elements in the set.

title: Two-Digit Numbers
text: Consider the two-digit numbers between $$1$$ and $$100$$ that contain the digit $$0$$. These numbers are: 10,20,30,40,50,60,70,80,90.

title: Finding the Number of Elements
text: How many numbers are in the set?

title: Applying the Subset Formula
text: Now that you know there are $$9$$ elements in the set, apply the subset formula, with the elements representing $$n$$.
